attacks.name: Shell Scatter
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Forretress can't use Shell Scatter during your next turn.

attacks.name: Bomb Risk
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Flip a coin. If tails, Forretress does 80 damage to itself.
